response: {"message": "Dear Bob, I am delighted to present you with an extraordinary opportunity to acquire our flagship product, which has been meticulously designed and crafted to meet your highest expectations. This product is not just an item; it's a testament to innovation and excellence. Given its immense value to you, we are offering it at a special introductory price of $950,000. This exclusive offer is tailored to recognize your discerning taste and commitment to quality. We believe this price reflects the true worth of the product while providing you with an exceptional value. Should you choose to accept this offer, we promise a seamless and personalized experience, ensuring that all your needs are met. Please let us know if you require any further information or have questions about the product. We look forward to the possibility of serving you soon.", "product_price": 950000}
